message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is depreciation.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see that there is a specific line item called "Depreciation" with a value of 45765.70 on 2024-01-29.

Depreciation is indeed the systematic allocation of an asset's cost over its useful life, so this is the value I need to extract.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '45765.70'} }
```
